mapper.insert: insert into biz_ticket_log(ticket_id, action, old_status, new_status, operator_id, operator_name, remark, create_time) values(#{ticketId}, #{action}, #{oldStatus}, #{newStatus}, #{operatorId}, #{operatorName}, #{remark}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select log_id, ticket_id, action, old_status, new_status, operator_id, operator_name, remark, create_time from biz_ticket_log where ticket_id = #{ticketId} order by log_id desc
